sn46.45:1.1: “Sir, they speak of a one ‘wise and clever’.
sn46.45:1.2: How is a person who is wise and clever defined?”
sn46.45:1.3: “Mendicant, they’re called wise and clever because they’ve developed and cultivated the seven awakening factors.
sn46.45:1.5: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
sn46.45:1.6: They’re called wise and clever because they’ve developed and cultivated these seven awakening factors.”
